name: Alarm Clock Free
description: Alarm Clock Free turns your android into a beautiful digital clock and alarm clock for free!      If you enjoy Alarm Clock Free, there is a paid version Alarm Clock Pro with more features:  - Set your own song or playlist as alarm  - More colorful themes  - Built-in flashlight      Features include:   Clock   - Gorgeous Green LCD style display  - Vertical and horizontal modes  - 12 or 24 hour format  - Show/Hide seconds  - Customizable auto-lock time   Alarm   - Super big Snooze/Stop Alarm buttons  - Multiple alarms supported  - 11 built-in alarm sounds: Ascending, Birds, Classic, Cuckoo, Digital, Electronic, High Tone, Mbira, Old Clock, Rooster, School Bell  - Sound ON/OFF,  - Sound volume adjustable  - Snooze ON/OFF  - Snooze time customizable  - Vibrate ON/OFF  - Sound Fade In: Wake up gently in the morning  - Alarm works even screen is locked or android is in silent mode   Tips   - Slide/flick up and down to dim the screen  Enjoy another free app from iHandySoft!
